# Physics-Informed Neural Network in PyTorch

This is an implementation of [PINN](https://github.com/maziarraissi/PINNs) algorithm in the papers by Raissi et al. in PyTorch 1.6.0. The aforementioned papers are listed below:

  - Raissi, Maziar, Paris Perdikaris, and George Em Karniadakis. "[Physics Informed Deep Learning (Part I): Data-driven Solutions of Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations](https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.10561)." arXiv preprint arXiv:1711.10561 (2017).

  - Raissi, Maziar, Paris Perdikaris, and George Em Karniadakis. "[Physics Informed Deep Learning (Part II): Data-driven Discovery of Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations](https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.10566)." arXiv preprint arXiv:1711.10566 (2017).
